Class iPhoneCanvas

java.lang.Object
  javax.microedition.lcdui.Displayable

              net.landspurg.effects.iPhoneCanvas

public class iPhoneCanvas
extends javax.microedition.lcdui.game.GameCanvas

A replacement for MIDP2 List object. Replace an existing "List" display with this one to have "iTunes" like display....
